website_summaries.verdict: A reasonable choice for serious runners – combines good looks and foot support to help you get the most out of your run.
pros: Offers lightweight mesh, flexible rubber soles, and Lunar core for optimal support and performance
Comes is several attractive color combinations
cons: The fit is a bit tight – especially around the toes
The soles also have the tendency to make a squeaking noise when you walk on hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: My favorite all around running shoe EVER
customer_reviews.text: Rarely can I find a running shoe that I don’t have to break in. I typically get blisters and squeezed toe issues. These are the best shoes—they are light and comfortable. As one reviewer said and I’m repeating :”They wrap around my feet like a supportive glove”. I bought a second pair as a back up. Now if only I can find the same fit in a trail runner
customer_reviews.author: S.C.F

customer_reviews.title: I did some research and these we said to be a good bang for less buck
customer_reviews.text: I am not a running guru. I just started training for 5k's. I knew i needed quality shoes. I did some research and these we said to be a good bang for less buck :) I am not had them LOOOOONG, but i have trained a few times with them. Some running, some lifting, and some plyometrics. I didn't think about them ONCE. This in my mind is a sign that they are fabulous. I only notice my shoes when something is wrong with them (ex: feet hurt). These shoes look good. These shoes are light. They are flexible. They have good support. I am digging them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved these shoes for the first two months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these shoes for the first two months. I only wear them for running workouts in the gym (1-2 times a week) and the cushion depleted after 2 months. I've contacted Nike to see if they will replace the insoles, but they don't offer that at this time. A lot of money for a shoe that only lasts 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe! Amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and they fit exactly as they should, she is ABSOLUTELY in love with them! She has an entire Nike AND Under Armour wardrobe- yet picked these to wear the first day of school!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs 007

customer_reviews.title: Good Spring/Summer Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for running. I test them out with my family on a morning run. Theses shoes let your feet breathe. They are light and airy. However, they are not good for a rainy day run but, a hot dry day, they are perfect. The shoes look just like the photo and they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shock absorbable.
customer_reviews.text: Insanely comfortable and shock absorbent. Would have kept, but needed slip-ons and photos were a little misleading. Had I wanted lace-ups, these would hv been a no-brainer. Searched on line for best deal. Price on sale very fair, bit high full priced for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: aNon

customer_reviews.title: Way to narrow .
customer_reviews.text: Cute sneakers but the toe box is to narrow. And I do not have a wide foot. The length fits but the width is to narrow that it feels like ur feet are being squeezed. I wanted to really like these but unfortunately will have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: BKmom:-)

customer_reviews.title: Sooo lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned two pairs of these and I’m so sad they’re discontinued! They fit perfectly. I’m typically a 9-9.5, and in these shoes I’m more of a 9.5 They’re snug but perfect and they DO open up!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I've had a hard time with this shoe. I've had it for 2 months and they are already squeaking and have this little popping noise when I walk on one of them. I've bought quite a few Nike free runs and this is the first time it's happened. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Gwink

customer_reviews.title: My best pair ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and light weight shoes I have ever owned. If you've ever owned Sketchers Go Walk shoes, they are even more comfortable than those. I bought them for working out in but ended up just wearing them as every day shoes. The fit is great. I need to buy them in every color offered.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Love

customer_reviews.title: Foot Clouds!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite walking shoes. They fit perfectly barefoot but I would size up if I wanted to wear them with socks. I have a lot of foot pain and these give me relief while allowing me to walk long distances.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthea Brooks

customer_reviews.title: The foam soles are super light weight and great for running on pavement but ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap foamy soles made the shoe feel slippery. The foam soles are super light weight and great for running on pavement but not on floors.
customer_reviews.author: GRC

customer_reviews.title: light enough to run 2nd half marathon in under 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: these are great for running long distance and sprinting intervals! usually wear at 10/10.5 and the 11 fits best. i also use custom inserts because i have flat feet and would recommend for others to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: apickjones

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! Most comfortable shoe I've ever owned. Bought this as a second pair, already had another pair of the same shoe. I have a very small foot & it's hard to find shoes that fit. I would buy this shoe again and again.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are already falling apart after 3 months of use. The bottoms have holes in them. I am terribly disappointed as at first my niece loved these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best Nike’s for me by far
customer_reviews.text: Light cushy & comfy ... the perfect shoe for me
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I feel supported, cushioned and in touch with the ground--in a good way. Easy to break in, no foot, knee or hip pain during the transition.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT !
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable and practical nikes I've ever owned! This is my 3rd pair & they get better every time! Fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Martika Mac

customer_reviews.title: In love with these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size from my normal, I'm glad I did these shoes fit perfectly. I have worn them on my last two runs and I had no need to even break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Sophina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My feet don't hurt in these and I receive compliments all day long on the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dee....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, light and comfortable. They wrap around my feet like a supportive glove. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about the Nike Free shoes. I especially enjoy these for distance. I need the extra padding for my knees and these shoes check all the boxes. Didn't even have to break them in. They felt great wearing them the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love theemmmmmmm my feet have never felt sooo good no plantar factitious pain what so ever! 4mm drop!
customer_reviews.author: Cassi Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. It is like wearing slippers. So comfortable to wear while I am working out. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kerpon

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They are bright, true to size, and are extremely comfortable. They have a cushioned insole that is still great after 5 months of wear. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth shoe of this style I’ve purchased, all different colors. It’s the most comfortable running shoe I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers I think I've ever owned. Lightweight, breathable....wish I bought multiple pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J. Landin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes this is the second pair that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered women's instead of men's??
customer_reviews.text: They csn as women's even though the order says it was men's size. Could have been my personal user operator error, but either way it is a problem & im not sure how to return them. Any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes would be nice if brand new
customer_reviews.text: Sent me a worn/used pair of shoes. The shoes would be nice if brand new, which is what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were exactly what I ordered and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable walking around shoes I've ever had! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable. Wore them for a run the first day ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. Wore them for a run the first day out of the box. No break in period required.
customer_reviews.author: anonomus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable pair of running shoes I've ever owned! Def buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Very little support which is perfect since I would prefer to be barefoot!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn but they rrun very small. Order a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Either the size was misprinted or these shoes run exceptionally small, both in length and width. The insole of the shoe is worthless - you would need to replace it immediately to be able to wear these comfortably for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Super comfortable, great for walking long distances, for work, for school, and for work outs. They are definitely worth their price. And they come in many different colors for anyone's liking.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sifuentes

customer_reviews.title: I do like that they are very lightweight and have good arch
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and needed a little more support around the heel. But, I do like that they are very lightweight and have good arch support
customer_reviews.author: Angela G. Doering

customer_reviews.title: great color, little tight
customer_reviews.text: great color ,little tight .real lite .well made. eye catcher,
customer_reviews.author: attilio balatti

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe, however when walking the shoes make a popping noise., I don't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love me.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6 1/2, got a 6. If I could be bothered to go through the hell that is the US Postal Service in December I would return them and ask for a full refund, but because it I work two jobs and Christmas is in 5 days, I guess my brother's girlfriend is getting a $122 pair of shoes. Love me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Womens Free Rn Distance
product_meta.description: Take your run to all new heights with the Nike Zoom Fly 2. With a dual-density foam midsole, this versatile shoe provides mild support from overpronation, with enough cushioning for daily training or speedwork..
feature_bullets: Zoom Air located in the forefoot consists of low-profile pressurized air pockets that flex on contact for responsive cushioning
Cushlon is a full-length midsole foam that delivers plush, resilient cushioning
Phylon Wedge is a midsole foam piece in the heel for lightweight, resilient cushioning
